name: Sprivateers (name IP)
description:
This is the prototype of a game I may or may not finish.

When starting a game and switching back to the main map there is a bit of waiting (3-ish seconds) as I have not implemeted any loading screen. (Or optimised the loading) . When on the map for the first time , click on any of the asteroid you want to be placed on. For now only one fight as be created, the prototype is mostly for the main map. (And also to force me to keep working on my projects)

The game is a roguelike space shooter, mainly inspired by FTL. 

You'll be playing as a crew of space privateers doing some privateering stuff (not sure what at the moment) on a randomly generated map with radomly generated fights. To help you you'll be able to finds and buy weapons and upgrades. 

Nothing from the protoype is set in stone however the map and the wway it's generated will most likely not changed.

If you have any suggestion, feel free to post them in the comments.

-Backgrounds created using Space Background Generator by Deep Fold

- Music from the Space Music Pack by Goose Ninja

- Models made using picoCAD by Johan Peitz
